courses.institution_full_name: Faculdade de tecnologia de São José do Rio Preto

about_me:
I've been programming in Java since 2012 because I wanted to make cell
  phone games. I never imagined that it would become one of the most used languages in
  the world.I have experience working on large projects for English, American, Brazil
  ian and French companies with more than 20,000 employees across several countries,
  with ecosystems for robust systems with thousands of accesses per second. I have a
  degree in Systems Analysis from Fatec (2016), and a degree in Music from the State
  University of Londrina (2021) and a ongoing master's degree in education. I truly
  believe that only through collaborative thinking and open knowledge and technologies
  can society truly evolve and innovate, in order to optimize processes and create new
  solutions in a holistic, socially engaged way and aligned with sustainable develop
  ment and I would really like to work with partners, customers and people with the
  same values and purposes.As hardskills, I have experience in Java Spring Framework,
  Maven, MVC, microservices architecture, C#, Git, SQL, NoSql, MongoDB, Spring Reac
  tive, Spring Security, OAuth2, Swagger, Scrum, Web Services, Rest and building APIs,
  having worked on web, desktop and mobile projects throughout my academic and profess
  sional journey. As a teacher, I also bring the expertise of a career in which it is
  necessary to understand human development as an elementary part of daily work, with
  people and knowledge as the raw material of the professional routine, essential
  softskills for teamwork and oriented solutions for people.

description:
Back end developer working with microservices archtecture solutions
      with Spring, Spring Security, OAuth2, Spring Webflux, BitBucket, Sonar, MongoDb,
      DoccumentDB, Veracode, AWS, Canary deployment, Java 11-17, Cucumber, JUnit and other
      frameworks @ Serasa Experian. Our product was an IDP and account manager with
      millions of hits per minute and was awarded the highest audit scores. Our clients,
      in addition to Brazil, were Colombia, India, among several other countries in Latin
      America and other regions of the world.

The company sustain products for a major french industry of water
      management, waste management and circular economy. I tried to help with my Java ex
      perience in this ecological challange and transformation.

We wrote and maintained some microservices applications using the
      Spring universe to develop a financial solution for a worldwide major industry.

last_jobs.location: São José do Rio Preto - SP
description:
We wrote and maintained some applications using Java, Asp.Net and
      C# to develop a solution for large Brazilian gas and energy industries.

We maintained all the company machines (servers and user computers)
      as well as the company applications using Java desktop, Hibernate, JSF and
      Primefaces custom solution for a single client/sponsor.
